channel.title: Web3 on CEO Playbook
channel.description: Recent content in Web3 on CEO Playbook

item.title: Artifract
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: The Philippines’ first tokenized NFT platform backed by UBX and Unit 256 Ventures, which utilizes ‘Token Factory’ technology to fractionalize real-world assets like fine art and collectibles.

item.title: Consensys
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: The market-leading blockchain technology company founded by Ethereum co-founder Joe Lubin, responsible for the critical infrastructure (MetaMask, Infura, Linea) powering the decentralized web.

item.title: Cardano
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: Partnership between UBX and the Cardano Foundation, marking the launch of the first public stake pool in the Philippines operated by a regulated financial institution.

item.title: Biddit
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: UBX-backed PropTech platform that transforms real estate investing by allowing users to bid for, purchase, and co-own vetted properties with accessible entry points.
